name: welcome
body:
### I'm @almosteverywhere. 

### I like to do lots of cool stuff! 

### I give lots of talks. Here are some of my talks:

2014: Strange Loop (upcoming) 
PyCon "Analyzing rap lyrics using Python"
Montreal Python, "Hacker School", Montreal 
Montreal Python "Analyzing rap lyrics using python" lightning talk
TEDxBKK "How Bangkok wakes up" documentary photography on what happens in Bangkok at 6,7,8 am.
Barcamp Montreal "How to travel by yourself and be awesome" 

### School: I attended Hacker School(never graduate!), NYC, in Summer 2013
I have a Bachelors of Mathematics from the University of Waterloo!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
